scripts.build-js: browserify  -t bulkify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-runtime ] ] -t brfs src/index.js -o js/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: budo src/index.js:index.html -p 9967 --serve js/bundle.js --live=*.{js,html,css} --pushstate -- -t bulkify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015-native-generators ] ] -t brfs
scripts.production: npm run build-sass && npm run build-js
scripts.development: npm run watch-sass & npm run watch-js
scripts.publish-ci: npm run production && git commit -a -m 'publish-ci' && git push
